purpleculture_pinyin:
zàn
to patronize; to support; to praise; (Internet slang) to like (an online post on Facebook etc)
опекать; поддерживать; хвалить; (Интернет-сленг) ставить лайки (онлайн-сообщение на Facebook и т. Д.)
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 赞)
Pictophonetic: 兟 indicates the sound; 貝 (money) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
贊成 [ zàn chéng ]: to approve; to endorse; (literary) to assist
讚賞 [ zàn shǎng ]: to admire; to praise; to appreciate
讚揚 [ zàn yáng ]: to praise; to approve of; to show approval
贊同 [ zàn tóng ]: to approve of; to endorse; (vote) in favor
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 兟 [ shēn ] to advance
    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
heisig_chinese_memo: To succor means to help or aid.  Before you get lots of shells (money) you need succor, but afterwards, you don't need any.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the shellfish (貝) gets ahead (先) twice to get agreement
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: To succor means to help or aid.  Before you get lots of shells (money) you need succor, but afterwards, you don't need any.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The characters of the Qin family in the Warring States period changed from " bei " to "㚘", and the form of "㚘" in Xiaozhuan was corrupted to "兟", which was then written as " zan ". The original meaning is auxiliary and auxiliary. "Said Wen": "Zan, see also. Cong Bei Congxian." Duan Yucai's note: "This is to use the rhyme as a training, doubt as the reason why you see. It is said that when you see each other, you must praise. "Shi Guanli" "Zhang Guan", "Shi Hun Li" "Zhang Zhe", the notes are: "Zan, Zuo Ye." "Zhou Li. Dazai" note: "Zan, help also." If there is a compliment in all salutes , Not to see each other alone." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "The First Year of the Zhao Dynasty": "The country has no way, but the years and valleys are harmonious, and heaven is praised." "Zhou Li. Autumn official. "Simin": "Internal History, Sihui, Tsukazai two, rule by praise the king." Zheng Xuan's note: "Zan, Zuoya."

" Like " means a compliment ceremony, that is, announcing the procedure aside during the ceremony and letting people go. Such as "Huainanzi. "Shize": "Situ sculpts the plain, and praises it from the north." It also refers to the person who guides the ceremony, also known as the "prayer." Such as "Rituals. "Shi Guan Li": "The guest is like a master's service, and the praiser Xuan Duan follows it, standing outside the outer door." "Historical Records. "The Book of the First Emperor of Qin": "The courtesy of Que Ting, I have never dared not to praise the guest."

" Like " extends to show guidance. "Guang Ya. Interpretation III: "Zan, Tao also." Such as "Mandarin. "Zhou Yu": "Tai Shi praised the king, Wang Jing followed it." Wei Zhao's note: "Zan, guide also." Another example is "Mandarin. "Jin Yu": "The quality will be good and the virtuous will praise it, and it will be helpful."

" Like " means to inform or introduce. Such as "Historical Records. "The Biography of Wei Gongzi": "When he gets home, he invites Hou Sheng to sit down and praises the guests all the time. The guests are all shocked." Sima Zhensuoyin: "Like those who like it, tell the guests, saying that Hou Sheng will tell the guests all the time." , Referral. Such as "Historical Records. The Biography of Pingyuan Junyuqing: "There are those who fail in the door. Before, they praised Pingyuan Jun."

" Like " praised, praise, made after " praise ." Such as "Selected Works. Song Yu's "Goddess Fu" and a Preface": "You Ziwei, unbeatable." "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "Xu Chu Chuan": "Taihe Zhong, Di Si Chu Zhongxiao, give commendations, and give the two sons and grandchildren Jue Guan Neihou."

" Zan " also refers to the commentary text at the end of the Ji Chuan Ti history books, such as "Zan Yue" at the end of the "Han Shu" and "Han Shu". "Wen Xin Diao Long. "Song praise": "and Shiban Gushu, to praise and praise."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The characters of the Qin family in the Warring States period changed from " bei " to "㚘", and the form of "㚘" in Xiaozhuan was transformed into "兟", which was then written as " zan ". The original meaning is auxiliary and auxiliary.
humanum_full_description:
戰國秦系文字從「貝」從「㚘」，小篆「㚘」形訛為「兟」形，遂寫成「贊」。本義是輔佐、輔助。《說文》：「贊，見也。从貝从兟。」段玉裁注：「此以疊韻為訓，疑當作所以見也。謂彼此相見必資贊者。〈士冠禮〉『贊冠者』、〈士昏禮〉『贊者』，注皆曰：『贊，佐也。』《周禮．大宰》注曰：『贊，助也。』是則凡行禮必有贊，非獨相見也。」如《左傳．昭公元年》：「國無道而年穀和熟，天贊之也。」《周禮．秋官．司民》：「內史、司會、冢宰貳之，以贊王治。」鄭玄注：「贊，佐也。」

　　「贊」表示贊禮，即典禮時在旁宣告程序，讓人進行。如《淮南子．時則》：「司徒搢朴，北嚮以贊之。」又指引導儀式的人，亦稱「贊者」。如《儀禮．士冠禮》：「賓如主人服，贊者玄端從之，立于外門之外。」《史記．秦始皇本紀》：「闕廷之禮，吾未嘗敢不從賓贊也。」

　　「贊」引申表示引導。《廣雅．釋詁三》：「贊，道也。」如《國語．周語》：「太史贊王，王敬從之。」韋昭注：「贊，導也。」又如《國語．晉語》：「質將善而賢良贊之，則濟可竢。」

　　「贊」表示告知、引見。如《史記．魏公子列傳》：「至家，公子引侯生坐上坐，徧贊賓客，賓客皆驚。」司馬貞索隱：「贊者，告也，謂以侯生遍告賓客。」又表示引進、引薦。如《史記．平原君虞卿列傳》：「門下有毛遂者，前，自贊於平原君」「自贊」即自薦。

　　「贊」表示稱讚、贊美，後作「讚」。如《文選．宋玉〈神女賦〉一首並序》：「瓌姿瑋態，不可勝贊。」《三國志．魏書．許褚傳》：「太和中，帝思褚忠孝，下詔褒贊，復賜褚子孫二人爵關內侯。」

　　「贊」還表示紀傳體史書在篇末的評論性文字，例如《漢書》、《後漢書》篇末的「贊曰」。《文心雕龍．頌讚》：「及史班固書，託贊褒貶。」
humanum_short_description: 戰國秦系文字從「貝」從「㚘」，小篆「㚘」形訛為「兟」形，遂寫成「贊」。本義是輔佐、輔助。

Pinyin: zàn
English Definition: to patronize; to support; to praise; (Internet slang) to like (an online post on Facebook etc)
Total strokes: 19; Radical: 貝
Pictophonetic: 兟 indicates the sound; 貝 (money) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 兟 [ shēn ] to advance
    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
Example Words:

讚賞 [ zàn shǎng ]: to admire; to praise; to appreciate
讚揚 [ zàn yáng ]: to praise; to approve of; to show approval
贊同 [ zàn tóng ]: to approve of; to endorse; (vote) in favor

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 兟 indicates the sound; 貝 (money) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 兟 [ shēn ] to advance
    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
①幫助，輔佐：贊助。贊劃。贊襄(協助)。贊理。贊成。
②主持禮儀：贊禮。
③誇獎，稱揚：讚歎。讚許。讚揚。贊和。讚頌。讚賞。讚詞。讚譽。稱讚。
④一種文體，用於頌揚人物：小贊。像贊。

戰國秦系文字從「 貝 」從「 㚘 」，小篆「 㚘 」形訛為「 兟 」形，遂寫成「 贊 」。本義是輔佐、輔助。《說文》：「贊，見也。从貝从兟。」段玉裁注：「此以疊韻為訓，疑當作所以見也。謂彼此相見必資贊者。〈士冠禮〉『贊冠者』、〈士昏禮〉『贊者』，注皆曰：『贊，佐也。』《周禮．大宰》注曰：『贊，助也。』是則凡行禮必有贊，非獨相見也。」如《左傳．昭公元年》：「國無道而年穀和熟，天贊之也。」《周禮．秋官．司民》：「內史、司會、冢宰貳之，以贊王治。」鄭玄注：「贊，佐也。」 「 贊 」表示贊禮，即典禮時在旁宣告程序，讓人進行。如《淮南子．時則》：「司徒搢朴，北嚮以贊之。」又指引導儀式的人，亦稱「贊者」。如《儀禮．士冠禮》：「賓如主人服，贊者玄端從之，立于外門之外。」《史記．秦始皇本紀》：「闕廷之禮，吾未嘗敢不從賓贊也。」 「 贊 」引申表示引導。《廣雅．釋詁三》：「贊，道也。」如《國語．周語》：「太史贊王，王敬從之。」韋昭注：「贊，導也。」又如《國語．晉語》：「質將善而賢良贊之，則濟可竢。」 「 贊 」表示告知、引見。如《史記．魏公子列傳》：「至家，公子引侯生坐上坐，徧贊賓客，賓客皆驚。」司馬貞索隱：「贊者，告也，謂以侯生遍告賓客。」又表示引進、引薦。如《史記．平原君虞卿列傳》：「門下有毛遂者，前，自贊於平原君」「自贊」即自薦。 「 贊 」表示稱讚、贊美，後作「 讚 」。如《文選．宋玉〈神女賦〉一首並序》：「瓌姿瑋態，不可勝贊。」《三國志．魏書．許褚傳》：「太和中，帝思褚忠孝，下詔褒贊，復賜褚子孫二人爵關內侯。」 「 贊 」還表示紀傳體史書在篇末的評論性文字，例如《漢書》、《後漢書》篇末的「贊曰」。《文心雕龍．頌讚》：「及史班固書，託贊褒貶。」
